Description.Text: The 3-star Throstles Nest Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Liverpool. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, fax machine, photocopying, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Throstles Nest Hotel caters to your needs.
The 3-star Throstles Nest Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday
